Combat_Consumables.name: Elixir of Magic
Combat_Consumables.special_effect: Increases magical attack by 5 for 5 turns

Combat_Consumables.name: Elixir of Defense
Combat_Consumables.special_effect: Increases physical defense by 5 for 5 turns
